about_the_game:
The ChronoClock - Original Soundtrack contains the complete soundtrack from the game.

With 29 tracks, the soundtrack also features the opening theme, "Love, Five Minutes Ago" performed by Miyuki Hashimoto and the ending theme, "Their Chronicle" performed by Rio Asaba. The soundtrack is available in both MP3 and FLAC formats.
